rules.name: disablePlayerSpawnCommand
extras: Prevents players from abusing it to teleport around.

rules.name: displayNameCarpetBot
rules.description: Display "[bot] next to Carpet bot names".

rules.name: displayNameVanillaTweaksAFK
rules.description: Display "[afk] next to AFK player names".

rules.name: displayNamesOnPlayerList
rules.description: Show server-side displayNames on player list.
extras: Required for player list manipulation rules to work.

rules.name: enderDragonNoGriefing
rules.description: Prevent Ender Dragon from breaking any blocks.
